dialogues.speaker: SARAH
dialogues.text: Shit! The flashlight cuts out.

dialogues.speaker: SARAH
dialogues.text: Oh God! No! Sarah hits the back of her flashlight. No use. Vivien rushes toward the door. Jamie grabs her arm.

dialogues.speaker: JAMIE
dialogues.text: Vivien, donвЂ™t!

dialogues.speaker: VIVIEN
dialogues.text: Jamie, let go! She breaks away. The FOOSTEPS sound louder, closer.

dialogues.speaker: LIBRARY
dialogues.text: A torn carpet spreads across the floor. Crammed bookshelv gather dust. Old computers sit on top of wooden counters. Vivien steps inside, Jamie and Sarah following in behind her.

dialogues.speaker: VIVIEN
dialogues.text: Casey! They stop near the front counter.

dialogues.speaker: JAMIE
dialogues.text: YвЂ™all, letвЂ™s get the fuck outta here! We can come back--  75.

dialogues.speaker: SARAH
dialogues.text: Shut the fuck up, Jamie! The door SHUTS behind them. Jamie turns around.

dialogues.speaker: JAMIE
dialogues.text: Fuck this! He grabs VivienвЂ™s arm.

dialogues.speaker: JAMIE
dialogues.text: LetвЂ™s go! Vivien pulls away.

dialogues.speaker: VIVIEN
dialogues.text: Wait. Sarah points across the room.

dialogues.speaker: SARAH
dialogues.text: There he is! Sitting on the couch, Casey looks straight ahead, turned away from them. A long table stands in front of him. ChrisвЂ™s camcorder on top of a sofa sitting across from the couch Casey occupies. The cameraвЂ™s red light glows, its lens pointe right at Casey.

dialogues.speaker: SARAH
dialogues.text: Casey! Casey continues ignoring them.

dialogues.speaker: VIVIEN
dialogues.text: WhatвЂ™s he doing? Sarah charges toward him.

dialogues.speaker: SARAH
dialogues.text: Stop it, Casey! Vivien follows her. The hesitant Jamie waits behind.

dialogues.speaker: JAMIE
dialogues.text: SomethingвЂ™s not right. Sarah stops near the couch. She jumps back, startled. Dro her flashlight.  76. The nude Casey sits on the sofa. He looks on at the camcorder, his eyes blank.

dialogues.speaker: SARAH
dialogues.text: Jesus! Casey! Vivien stops next to her.

dialogues.speaker: VIVIEN
dialogues.text: Oh God! Sarah grabs CaseyвЂ™s arm.

dialogues.speaker: SARAH
dialogues.text: What the Hell are you doing? He doesnвЂ™t move, refusing to face her. Jamie snatches the locked door handle. No way out.

dialogues.speaker: JAMIE
dialogues.text: Fuck! Sarah shakes Casey.

dialogues.speaker: SARAH
dialogues.text: Casey, look at me! Casey shoves her to the floor.

dialogues.speaker: VIVIEN
dialogues.text: Sarah! The helpless Sarah looks on as Casey stands up. Vivien leans down next to Sarah, holding her close. Jamie watches Casey FLIP the table upside-down. Three met legs jut out.

dialogues.speaker: JAMIE
dialogues.text: Shit. Jamie runs toward him.

dialogues.speaker: JAMIE
dialogues.text: Casey! Casey turns around, confronting the group. Jamie comes to a stop a few feet away from him.  77.

dialogues.speaker: SARAH
dialogues.text: Casey. ItвЂ™s me. Casey falls back onto one of the table legs. The metal slides up his ass, SPLATTERING blood over his naked body. He remains quiet, despondent. No sense of panic.

dialogues.speaker: VIVIEN
dialogues.text: Oh God! Covering her mouth, Sarah turns away, horrified. Like a javelin, the metal leg protrudes through his crotc Casey grabs at it, his eyes lacking emotion. The camcorder records Casey convulsing. Blood and saliva pour out of his mouth.

dialogues.speaker: JAMIE
dialogues.text: God. Jamie watches him go still.

dialogues.speaker: SARAH
dialogues.text: Casey. The camcorder turns off by itself. Jamie faces Vivien and Sarah.

dialogues.speaker: JAMIE
dialogues.text: I told yвЂ™all.

dialogues.speaker: VIVIEN
dialogues.text: Jamie, no.

dialogues.speaker: JAMIE
dialogues.text: ItвЂ™s Louise!

dialogues.speaker: VIVIEN
dialogues.text: Stop this!

dialogues.speaker: JAMIE
dialogues.text: IвЂ™m not crazy, Goddammit!

dialogues.speaker: LOUISE, (V.0.)
dialogues.text: Jamie.

dialogues.speaker: JAMIE
dialogues.text: Did yвЂ™all hear that? The confused Vivien helps Sarah stand up.  78.

dialogues.speaker: VIVIEN
dialogues.text: Hear what? Terrified, Jamie searches for Louise.

dialogues.speaker: JAMIE
dialogues.text: Where is she?

dialogues.speaker: VIVIEN
dialogues.text: Jamie, sheвЂ™s not here. A computer CUTS on.

dialogues.speaker: JAMIE
dialogues.text: Shit! He stumbles toward it. A video plays on the screen.

dialogues.speaker: VIVIEN
dialogues.text: What is that? Jamie stops in front of the monitor. He recognizes the footage. The abandoned lot.

dialogues.speaker: JAMIE
dialogues.text: No! Vivien and Sarah crowd around him.

dialogues.speaker: VIVIEN
dialogues.text: Jamie. He pushes them back.

dialogues.speaker: JAMIE
dialogues.text: DonвЂ™t look!

dialogues.speaker: VIVIEN
dialogues.text: What are you doing?

dialogues.speaker: JAMIE
dialogues.text: SheвЂ™s fucking lying!

dialogues.speaker: LOUISE, (V.0.)
dialogues.text: Jamie. Jamie turns and glares, trying to find Louise.

dialogues.speaker: JAMIE
dialogues.text: (to Louise) Goddammit, leave me alone!  79. The video shows ChrisвЂ™s truck. TEENAGE JAMIE and TEENAG CASEY hang out. Sarah recognizes them in the clip.

dialogues.speaker: SARAH
dialogues.text: Casey.

dialogues.speaker: JAMIE
dialogues.text: (to Louise) You fucking bitch! Jamie throws the computer down, SMASHING the screen.

dialogues.speaker: SARAH
dialogues.text: Jamie! He confronts them.

dialogues.speaker: JAMIE
dialogues.text: SheвЂ™s trying to tear us apart! DonвЂ™t you see? SheвЂ™s lying!

dialogues.speaker: LOUISE, (V.0.)
dialogues.text: Jamie. Jamie glances up at the ceiling.

dialogues.speaker: JAMIE
dialogues.text: Leave me alone!

dialogues.speaker: SARAH
dialogues.text: YouвЂ™re crazy!

dialogues.speaker: VIVIEN
dialogues.text: Jamie. Babe. Different screens all turn on. The same video. The abando lot. Sarah points Vivien toward the monitors.

dialogues.speaker: SARAH
dialogues.text: Look! Jamie faces the computers, horrified.

dialogues.speaker: JAMIE
dialogues.text: No! You canвЂ™t do this to me. Vivien and Sarah stop in front of the closest monitor their curiosity overpowering them. Jamie leans against a wall. He turns away, defeated.  80.

dialogues.speaker: ON SCREEN
dialogues.text: Ten years ago. The same yard where Chris killed himself. Teenage ChrisвЂ™s truck sits parked in the middle of the Longnecks and cans litter the ground. Crushed joints and cigarettes scatter across the truckвЂ™s hood. Standing a few feet away, Teenage Jamie, 18, watches Teen Casey, 18, drag Louise to the ground. Teenage Casey cackles while groping Louise like a savage. She struggles, unable to break free. TEENAGE CHRIS, 18, stands further away, recording the act with his camcorder. Cigarette ashes and beer stains cover the boysвЂ™ graduat gowns.

dialogues.speaker: LOUISE
dialogues.text: No! Let me go!

dialogues.speaker: TEENAGE CASEY
dialogues.text: Shush, baby. Teenage Chris chuckles behind the camera.

dialogues.speaker: TEENAGE CHRIS
dialogues.text: Is this one for you?

dialogues.speaker: TEENAGE CASEY
dialogues.text: No, tonight weвЂ™ve got a graduation gift for a special someone. Teenage Chris points the camera at Teenage Jamie.

dialogues.speaker: TEENAGE CHRIS
dialogues.text: And we have a winner!

dialogues.speaker: TEENAGE JAMIE
dialogues.text: Who? Me?

dialogues.speaker: LOUISE
dialogues.text: (to Teenage Casey) You fucking creep! Teenage Casey slaps her.

dialogues.speaker: TEENAGE CASEY
dialogues.text: Shut up, bitch!  81.

dialogues.speaker: TEENAGE JAMIE
dialogues.text: Naw, man, I canвЂ™t.

dialogues.speaker: TEENAGE CASEY
dialogues.text: Yo, you canвЂ™t be a virgin forever bro.

dialogues.speaker: TEENAGE CHRIS
dialogues.text: ItвЂ™s time to pop that cherry, Janie. Louise faces Teenage Jamie, desperate.

dialogues.speaker: LOUISE
dialogues.text: Jamie, donвЂ™t! Please! Teenage Jamie doesnвЂ™t move, unsure what to do.

dialogues.speaker: LOUISE
dialogues.text: Help me! Teenage Casey tears LouiseвЂ™s dress, revealing her breas He grins and looks over at Teenage Chris.

dialogues.speaker: TEENAGE CASEY
dialogues.text: You getting a close-up? Teenage Chris zooms in on LouiseвЂ™s chest.

dialogues.speaker: TEENAGE CHRIS
dialogues.text: Got it!

dialogues.speaker: LOUISE
dialogues.text: Let me go! Teenage Casey glares at Teenage Jamie.

dialogues.speaker: TEENAGE CASEY
dialogues.text: Yo, hurry the fuck up!

dialogues.speaker: TEENAGE CHRIS
dialogues.text: Yeah, donвЂ™t puss out, Janie!

dialogues.speaker: TEENAGE CASEY
dialogues.text: Fucking Janie! Louise cries.

dialogues.speaker: LOUISE
dialogues.text: Jamie, please! DonвЂ™t do this! Teenage Jamie stares at her, his eyes blank.  82.

dialogues.speaker: LOUISE
dialogues.text: YouвЂ™re better than them!

dialogues.speaker: TEENAGE CASEY
dialogues.text: Come on, Jamie! DonвЂ™t you wanna lose it, buddy? Teenage Casey reaches under LouiseвЂ™s dress. She cringes his rough touch.

dialogues.speaker: LOUISE
dialogues.text: No!

dialogues.speaker: TEENAGE CASEY
dialogues.text: ArenвЂ™t you tired of always striking out? Think about it, Jamie. Teenage Casey retrieves LouiseвЂ™s thong.

dialogues.speaker: TEENAGE CASEY
dialogues.text: You donвЂ™t wanna be a virgin forever, do you? Being that scared little bitch like youвЂ™ve always been. ArenвЂ™t you tired of that, Jamie? Like a celebration, Teenage Casey tosses LouiseвЂ™s thong to the side.

dialogues.speaker: TEENAGE CASEY
dialogues.text: We got her all ready for you, buddy.

dialogues.speaker: TEENAGE CHRIS
dialogues.text: Get some, Jamie!

dialogues.speaker: LOUISE
dialogues.text: No, Jamie! Please!

dialogues.speaker: TEENAGE CASEY
dialogues.text: Now all you gotta doвЂ™s just be a fucking man, Jamie.

dialogues.speaker: TEENAGE CHRIS
dialogues.text: Yeah, show that bitch whoвЂ™s boss!

dialogues.speaker: LOUISE
dialogues.text: Jamie, no! Teenage Jamie UNZIPS his pants.  83.

dialogues.speaker: TEENAGE CASEY
dialogues.text: There you go, Jamie! Now thatвЂ™s what IвЂ™m talking about! Teenage Jamie leans over Louise. She stares at him, helpless.

dialogues.speaker: LOUISE
dialogues.text: No, please.

dialogues.speaker: TEENAGE JAMIE
dialogues.text: All this time, you just wanted them.

dialogues.speaker: TEENAGE CASEY
dialogues.text: Yeah, Jamie!

dialogues.speaker: LOUISE
dialogues.text: Jamie. Teenage Jamie covers LouiseвЂ™s mouth, suppressing her desperate pleas.

dialogues.speaker: TEENAGE JAMIE
dialogues.text: Now you want me to help you?

dialogues.speaker: TEENAGE CHRIS
dialogues.text: Get that bitch! The excited Teenage Casey watches Teenage Jamie climb on of Louise.

dialogues.speaker: TEENAGE CASEY
dialogues.text: ItвЂ™s showtime!

dialogues.speaker: TEENAGE CHRIS
dialogues.text: Hell yeah! Louise closes her eyes and turns away. The eager Teenage Casey and Teenage Chris gear up to watc the "show." Teenage Jamie thrusts against Louise, over and over. Loui cringes, the pain unbearable. Teenage Chris steps forward for a close-up. Like a demented teammate, Teenage Casey pats Teenage Jami on the back, offering support.  84.

dialogues.speaker: TEENAGE CASEY
dialogues.text: You got this, Jamie! YouвЂ™re the fucking man, bro!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The footage keeps rolling. Teenage Jamie collapses on top the petrified Louise, breathing heavy. Horrified, Vivien and Sarah turn to Jamie.

dialogues.speaker: VIVIEN
dialogues.text: (disgusted) You sick fuck. She charges toward Jamie.

dialogues.speaker: VIVIEN
dialogues.text: What the HellвЂ™s wrong with you? Jamie faces her, ashamed. Tears well up in his eyes.

dialogues.speaker: JAMIE
dialogues.text: IвЂ™m sorry. Vivien hits Jamie in the face, knocking him back against wall.

dialogues.speaker: VIVIEN
dialogues.text: How could yвЂ™all fucking do that?

dialogues.speaker: JAMIE
dialogues.text: IвЂ™m sorry. Vivien--

dialogues.speaker: VIVIEN
dialogues.text: You sick bastard!

dialogues.speaker: SARAH
dialogues.text: Both of yвЂ™all hid this from us.

dialogues.speaker: JAMIE
dialogues.text: They made me! I couldnвЂ™t tell anyone!

dialogues.speaker: SARAH
dialogues.text: That doesnвЂ™t make it right, asshole!  85.

dialogues.speaker: JAMIE
dialogues.text: She tried going to the Sheriff, but the fucker. He covered it up. Bitter tears stream down VivienвЂ™s face.

dialogues.speaker: JAMIE
dialogues.text: He didnвЂ™t do a Goddamn thing. Covered it all up for Casey. Vivien snatches her necklace off.

dialogues.speaker: VIVIEN
dialogues.text: You bastard! She hurls the necklace at Jamie, hitting him in the head.

dialogues.speaker: VIVIEN
dialogues.text: You sick fuck! Jamie turns and looks away.

dialogues.speaker: JAMIE
dialogues.text: (ashamed ) I donвЂ™t even know if her dad did it. Sheriff smeared him for us, made sure they got him. Kept that whole Goddamn family quiet forever.

dialogues.speaker: SARAH
dialogues.text: YвЂ™all are fucking sick! All of yвЂ™all! Jamie confronts them, tears sliding down his cheeks.

dialogues.speaker: JAMIE
dialogues.text: IвЂ™m sorry.

dialogues.speaker: SARAH
dialogues.text: She didnвЂ™t have a chance.

dialogues.speaker: JAMIE
dialogues.text: I know, Goddammit! I know! The monitors cut away from the rape footage. A new clip appears: Louise in her living room. Vivien notices the change.

dialogues.speaker: VIVIEN
dialogues.text: Oh God! They all watch the footage.  86.

dialogues.speaker: JAMIE
dialogues.text: Louise. Louise stares at the camera, her eyes looking right at Jamie. Her pale hand raises the butcher knife. Tears flowing from her eyes, Vivien covers her mouth.

dialogues.speaker: VIVIEN
dialogues.text: No. Without hesitation, Louise slides the blade over her jugular. Blood SPURTS out, hitting the lens. Vivien looks away.

dialogues.speaker: VIVIEN
dialogues.text: Oh God! All the while, Jamie watches the graphic clip, haunted by the video.

dialogues.speaker: JAMIE
dialogues.text: We did it. We caused her to die. Sarah hits his shoulder, enraged.

dialogues.speaker: SARAH
dialogues.text: Goddamn you! Jamie backs away. A surveillance video plays on the monitors: A naked Rob i his cell. Shedding tears, he stands up on the cot. Fasten the noose around his neck. Sarah watches, mortified.

dialogues.speaker: JAMIE
dialogues.text: No. This canвЂ™t be happening! Rob hops off the bed, the noose SNAPPING his neck instant His nude corpse SWAYS back-and-forth.

dialogues.speaker: SARAH
dialogues.text: Jesus. Sarah stumbles toward Vivien. Vivien holds her, both of t keeping their distance from Jamie. Various suicide clips now play at a rapid rate. Chris. Ka Casey. LouiseвЂ™s "victims."  87.

dialogues.speaker: SARAH
dialogues.text: ItвЂ™s all cause of yвЂ™all! Jamie bumps into the counter. He touches the surface, cutting his hand. Sarah lunges toward him, barely restrained by Vivien.

dialogues.speaker: SARAH
dialogues.text: Fucking pigs!

dialogues.speaker: VIVIEN
dialogues.text: Sarah. Jamie looks down at the counter. LouiseвЂ™s butcher knife. Jamie grabs the wooden handle. Blood drips from the sharp blade.

dialogues.speaker: JAMIE
dialogues.text: No. Vivien and Sarah stare at the knife, the weapon making th uneasy.

dialogues.speaker: VIVIEN
dialogues.text: Jamie. Jamie turns and faces them.

dialogues.speaker: VIVIEN
dialogues.text: DonвЂ™t do this. Jamie looks back at the monitor. The suicide video loop.

dialogues.speaker: JAMIE
dialogues.text: IвЂ™m sorry. Heavy books TUMBLE off the shelves, startling Sarah.

dialogues.speaker: SARAH
dialogues.text: Oh fuck!

dialogues.speaker: LOUISE, (V.0.)
dialogues.text: Jamie. Jamie glances around the library, trying to find Louise.

dialogues.speaker: JAMIE
dialogues.text: Louise! The unnerved Vivien watches him stumble around.  88.

dialogues.speaker: LOUISE, (V.0.)
dialogues.text: Jamie.

dialogues.speaker: SARAH
dialogues.text: HeвЂ™s flipped out! HeвЂ™s fucking psycho!

dialogues.speaker: VIVIEN
dialogues.text: They all have. Louise repeats JamieвЂ™s name, creating an eerie chant. Jamie stops and checks a computer screen. The monitor now shows footage from the library: Jamie staring at the screen.

dialogues.speaker: JAMIE
dialogues.text: Aw, fuck! Vivien and Sarah notice the live video.

dialogues.speaker: VIVIEN
dialogues.text: What the Hell? His eyes glued to the screen, Jamie watches Louise emerge from the corner shadows, gliding toward him.

dialogues.speaker: JAMIE
dialogues.text: Aw, God! Jamie whirls around. Louise waits behind him. Her unwavering glare holds his gaze. She looks glorious.

dialogues.speaker: JAMIE
dialogues.text: Louise. Jamie backs away, Louise following him step-for-step. Vivien and Sarah glance at a monitor. They watch Jamie sit on the sofa across from CaseyвЂ™s co Neither of them see Louise. SarahвЂ™s flashlight cuts on, illuminating Jamie like a m spotlight. The camcorder switches on by itself, turning on its own t point right at Jamie. Louise approaches him, her movements so effortless.  89. Panicking, he looks up at her. Nowhere to run.

dialogues.speaker: JAMIE
dialogues.text: You bitch! Jamie swings the knife and slices LouiseвЂ™s chest, cutti through her dress. A stream of black blood oozes out.

dialogues.speaker: JAMIE
dialogues.text: Aw, God! Louise stands still, her glare even more ominous.

dialogues.speaker: JAMIE
dialogues.text: Why? Why are you doing this? He slams his fist against the sofa.

dialogues.speaker: JAMIE
dialogues.text: You didnвЂ™t have to kill yourself! The angry Jamie turns away.

dialogues.speaker: JAMIE
dialogues.text: Goddammit, we donвЂ™t deserve to die! A babyвЂ™s CRIES erupt.

dialogues.speaker: JAMIE
dialogues.text: Aw, God! Jamie looks for the infant.

dialogues.speaker: JAMIE
dialogues.text: What the fuck was that? The unsettling CRIES grow louder and louder.

dialogues.speaker: JAMIE
dialogues.text: What the fuck? LouiseвЂ™s abdomen THROBS. Jamie jumps back. He stares at it, mortified.

dialogues.speaker: JAMIE
dialogues.text: No! No, Louise. He looks up at Louise, his eyes pleading.

dialogues.speaker: JAMIE
dialogues.text: IвЂ™m sorry! Goddammit, IвЂ™m sorry! Tears stream down his face.  90.

dialogues.speaker: JAMIE
dialogues.text: I did murder you. The hidden presence in LouiseвЂ™s abdomen PULSATES again again, each THROB more intense than the last. Louise reaches toward Jamie.

dialogues.speaker: JAMIE
dialogues.text: Our child. Giving him a slight nod, Louise grabs the back of JamieвЂ head, drawing him in closer toward her abdomen. Jamie looks up at Louise, greeted by her harsh glare. His eyes go blank. Emotionless. The babyвЂ™s monstrous WHINES become shriller as LouiseвЂ abdomen rots and falls apart. A gruesome FETUS BURSTS out of her stomach. The gory organism drips vivid goo. It reaches out with ti claw-like hands, its underdeveloped eyes targeting Jamie. Bellowing murky CRIES, the fetusвЂ™s claws latch onto Jam digging in deep through his tender flesh. Razor-sharp teeth emerge from the babyвЂ™s disjointed mou The flashlight beam showcases the babyвЂ™s fangs sinking JamieвЂ™s neck. Blood SPLATTERS over the walls and floor. A vicious feast Louise watches the attack, a gratified expression on her face. The camcorder films away, positioned at a perfect angle. Vivien and Sarah stare at Jamie, both of them disgusted b the sight. They donвЂ™t see Louise or the baby. Instead, they only s the naked Jamie holding LouiseвЂ™s butcher knife. Multipl stab wounds cover his crotch, his penis severed. A rough self-castration. Blood everywhere. The library door CREAKS open. The dying Jamie holds his hand out toward Vivien.  91.

dialogues.speaker: JAMIE
dialogues.text: Vivien. Sarah grabs VivienвЂ™s arm.

dialogues.speaker: SARAH
dialogues.text: Come on.

dialogues.speaker: JAMIE
dialogues.text: (weak) No! Spurning him, Vivien turns away.

dialogues.speaker: JAMIE
dialogues.text: Please... The weakened Jamie lowers his hand. Together, Vivien and Sarah exit the library, leaving the massacre behind. Leaning down, Jamie shuts his eyes. Blood DRIPS from his lifeless body. Flowing blood oozes toward the dying flashlight. The redn collides with the flickering beam before the light finall cuts out. Darkness suffocates the scene. FADE OUT.
